Creator Brian Young

Directed by Edward Bazalgette. Lisa James Larsson. Hannah Quinn. Stephen Woolfenden. Sallie Aprahamian. David Moore

Written by Iginio Straffi. Brian Young. Gregory Locklear. Amanda Rosenberg. Victoria Bata. Sarah Hooper. Niceole R. Levy. Speed Weed. Vanessa James Benton. Shaina Fewell

Cast Abigail Cowen( Bloom Peters / …13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Hannah van der Westhuysen( Princess Stella / …13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Precious Mustapha( Aisha13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Eliot Salt( Terra Harvey / …13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Elisha Applebaum( Musa13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Danny Griffin( Sky / …13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Sadie Soverall( Beatrix13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Freddie Thorp( Riven13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Theo Graham( Dane13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Robert James-Collier( Saul Silva13 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Leah Minto( Kat10 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Éanna Hardwicke( Sebastian / …7 episodes, 2022 ). Alex Macqueen( Professor Harvey6 episodes, 2021 ). Ken Duken( Andreas6 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Sean Sagar( Marco6 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Paulina Chávez( Flora6 episodes, 2022 ). Miranda Richardson( Headmistress Rosalind / …5 episodes, 2022 ). JJ Battell( Luke5 episodes, 2022 ). Harry Michell( Callum4 episodes, 2021 ). Kate Fleetwood( Queen Luna4 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Shameem Ahmad( Bavani Selvarajah4 episodes, 2022 ). Eva Birthistle( Vanessa Peters3 episodes, 2021 ). Pom Boyd( Dinner Lady Doris3 episodes, 2021 ). Daniel Betts( Professor Harvey / …3 episodes, 2022 ). Jayden Revri( Devin3 episodes, 2022 ). Josh Cowdery( Mike Peters2 episodes, 2021 ). Sarah Jane Seymour( Noura2 episodes, 2021 ). Ian O’Reilly( Nick2 episodes, 2022 ). Sinead Keegan( Gossiping Student #11 episode, 2021 ). John Quinn( Old Shepherd1 episode, 2021 ). Dean Quinn( Gossiping Student #21 episode, 2021 ). Malcolm Counihan( the Gardener1 episode, 2021 ). Erica Cody( Kat’s Girlfriend1 episode, 2021 ). Dearbhaile McKinny( Ivy1 episode, 2022 ). Andy Kellegher( Blood Witch1 episode, 2022 ). Adam Karim( Fire Fairy1 episode, 2021 ). James Lance( Uncle Arthur1 episode, 2022 ). David Duggan( Fire Fairy (uncredited)6 episodes, 2021 ). Corey Millar( Specialist / … (uncredited)6 episodes, 2021 ). Jordan Collins( School Fairy / … (uncredited)6 episodes, 2021 ). Chloe Harris( School Fairy (uncredited)4 episodes, 2021 ). Aaran Donoghue( Specialist (uncredited)3 episodes, 2021 ). Vivian Birungi( School Fairy (uncredited)3 episodes, 2021 ). Christopher Livingstone( Earth Fairy / … (uncredited)2 episodes, 2021 ). Niamh Cremin( Selfie Girl (uncredited)1 episode, 2021 ). Rebecca Ryan( School Fairy (uncredited)1 episode, 2021 ). Joseph Palmer( Solarian Guard (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Karl Hogan( Student (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 )

Language English

Producers Cristiana Buzzelli. Judy Counihan. Macdara Kelleher. John Keville. Joanne Lee. Kris Thykier. Brian Young. Shaina Fewell. Donna Eperon. Jon Finn. Niceole R. Levy. Sarah Hooper. Speed Weed

Production Archery Pictures. Archery Pictures. Cinesite.

Certificate16+

Official site Netflix

Season 2
